docs.snippet: LIMA, Peru, Dec. 15 -- The great unanswered question in South America today is the extent of President Juan D. Peron's ambition to dominate the continent. Is peronismo an export product and how much is it being exported?
docs.lead_paragraph: LIMA, Peru, Dec. 15 -- The great unanswered question in South America today is the extent of President Juan D. Peron's ambition to dominate the continent. Is peronismo an export product and how much is it being exported?

headline.main: ARGENTINES STRESS LATIN TRADE LINKS; Peron Held Favoring Economic Expansion Over Imposition of His Political System

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: AMERICAN NATIONS AND WESTERN HEMISPHERE POSSESSIONS

docs.snippet: Activity and a strong undertone in the Canadian dollar was the feature in an otherwise dull foreign exchange market during the past week. British pound sterling fluctuated within a limited range on transactions that were mostly routine.
docs.lead_paragraph: Activity and a strong undertone in the Canadian dollar was the feature in an otherwise dull foreign exchange market during the past week. British pound sterling fluctuated within a limited range on transactions that were mostly routine.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES; Week Ended Dec. 18, 1953

docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Dec. 24 (AP) -President Eisenhower put in effect today, as of Dec. 16, certain tariff concessions originally negotiated with Uruguay in 1949 but withheld pending Uruguay's ratification of the agreement.
docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Dec. 24 (AP) -President Eisenhower put in effect today, as of Dec. 16, certain tariff concessions originally negotiated with Uruguay in 1949 but withheld pending Uruguay's ratification of the agreement.
docs.abstract: Pres Eisenhower keeps present duty on certain Uruguayan exports despite cuts fixed in '49 pact now in effect

headline.main: Tariff Agreement With Uruguay, Negotiated in 1949, Now in Effect; Eisenhower Pre-Dates Order to Dec. 16 -Reductions on Certain Meat Products Omitted Pending New Discussions

docs.snippet: The last six months have brought a slight easing of censorship conditions and of other restrictions tending to curb the free flow of news both within nations and across borders. But danger signals continued to crop up all through the latter half of...
docs.lead_paragraph: The last six months have brought a slight easing of censorship conditions and of other restrictions tending to curb the free flow of news both within nations and across borders. But danger signals continued to crop up all through the latter half of 1953.
docs.abstract: AP survey of censorship and other factors hindering world news flow, July-Dec

headline.main: WORLD NEWS CURBS RELAXED SLIGHTLY; Various Forms of Censorship Follow Political Patterns of the Countries Involved
